co.uk.niadel.mpi.potions

Class PotionRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.potions.PotionRegistry

  • @VersionMarkingAnnotations.TestFeature(firstAppearance="1.0")
public final class PotionRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to register Potions. This makes sure that you can have unlimited potions and can easily distinguish between vanilla and modded. Also largely eliminates ID conflicts if you use a similar naming convention to that of the modId for your mod with a few minor changes (YOUR_NAME + mod_name:your_potion). You can still extend Potion here, and even extend other potions as long as they in turn extend Potion.
    Author:
    Niadel
